Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{3: 'Evening winds howl through the dark, dense forest.'}
{3: 'Yata pursues the Construct that took Shiva, occasionally glancing back to check her surroundings.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Finally lost them... I wonder how V and Discord are doing...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pushing aside waist-high weeds, she crouches down and closes her eyes to maximize her audio sensors.'}
{3: 'Soon, she picks up faint traces of movement.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Northwest... I knew they'd head for the school.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'If I go after them now, I can still catch up.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Just as Yata tries to stand up, an eerie electrical surge strikes her M.I.N.D.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '5'}
{3: 'A melody seeps in through her audio sensors...'}
{3: 'The song is tender, ethereal, and otherworldly.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_09.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront26.png', 4: '4'}
{1: '1', 2: "<size=40>—With deepest respect and gratitude for all you've done for me.</size>", 3: '-400'}
{3: "—With deepest respect and gratitude for all you've done for me."}
{1: '2', 2: '<size=40>—How many years have flown by since those days of school life...</size>', 3: '-400', 4: '-75', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
{3: '—How many years have flown by since those days of school life...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1.5'}
{3: "Something rings clear in Yata's ears..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg4901_09.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'The darkness of night fades away, replaced by the warm hues of dusk.'}
{3: 'Yata finds herself wearing a Misono High school uniform, lined up among other students for a class photo.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Yata, we've been waiting for you."}
{2: '???', 3: "It's been so many years, Yata... Where have you been all this time?"}
{2: '???', 3: 'Have you... forgotten about us all?'}
{3: 'Countless hands reach out from behind her, grabbing Yata by her shirt and hair.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: 'She whirls around to find nothing but decaying bones and skulls behind her.'}
{3: 'Clusters of hydrangeas bloom from their hollow eye sockets.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'Become one with us!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySugorokuScreen02.prefab'}
{3: 'Yata slams her fist into the ground, forcing the suffocating emotions out of her mind.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{3: 'When she opens her eyes again, she finds herself back in reality.'}
{3: 'She finds herself still surrounded by the endless night and eerily quiet forest.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'A hallucination... When did it get to me?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "But you would be dead wrong if you think you've got anything on me. My M.I.N.D. is not as weak as you think.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I'm gonna find you. Doesn't matter if you're the Punishing or some ghost.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Cold moonlight falls on Yata's shoulders as she dusts herself off and continues her pursuit."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory366.png'}
{3: 'As she emerges from the dense forest, the derelict school campus looms before her like a graveyard.'}
{3: 'Decades later, this once-great private school is nothing but forgotten ruins.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "You're in there, huh...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Yata's gaze fixes on an open side door of the school building."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Trying to lure me in? A pathetic attempt.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'The further I am from the commandant, the stronger these hallucinations become.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Is it a coincidence? After all these years... I'm back here again.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She strides through the school gate, across the courtyard, and up to the open side door.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "You'd better not die before I find you, Shiva.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'You better stay alive.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'At last, Yata steps into the school building—a place that has haunted her nightmares countless times.'}
{3: 'The echoes of an old melody linger endlessly, tucked away in hidden corners.'}
{3: "The melodies chorus together in the shadows, beyond Yata's perception."}
{3: 'Across all that time...'}
{3: 'Tender, ethereal, and otherworldly.'}
